name: This is fine *#*
description:
Please play in full screen for best experience (press the button at the bottom right of the game screen).

PITCH

This game is about a cloud doing his best to prevent the world to burn entierely. Go over the water and absorb water to rain over burning places. If the heat meter reaches its maximum the game ends.

HOW TO PLAY ?

Left & Right arrows : move around the earth.

Down arrow : Pour rain (hold it to pour longer)

CREDITS
